turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can you help me order a pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order two medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what are the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two pizzas both with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so 2 medium thin crust pizzas with extra cheese, did i get it right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your total is $25.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what is the pick up address?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bela luna's is located at 700 lincoln road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, how long will it take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. All right, thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you need a name for the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you just need to show the confirmation that will be sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, okay. All right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, enjoy!
